title: Congestion Revenue Rights (CRR) Analysis
description: A trader wants to analyze the value of Congestion Revenue Rights (CRRs), also known as FTRs, to see if they are a profitable investment.

tasks.description: Identify the top 10 most historically congested transmission paths in the market.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a ranked list of congested paths.

tasks.description: For each path, compare the historical auction price of the CRR to its actual payout (the congestion rent).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the historical profitability of holding CRRs on each path.

tasks.description: Recommend the most historically profitable CRRs to bid on in the next auction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of the top 3 CRRs to target.
